website_summaries.verdict: At about half the cost of some similar shot glass sets, this one is a good value for the price.
pros: Users find these glasses elegant and sturdy, with a nice size and weight
Some also report they held up to years of use
We love the flared, stylish look and smooth glass on this set
cons: Several users complained of receiving one ore more glasses arriving broken

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: These shot glasses are sturdy, beautiful, and for the price, they can't be beat! I keep half in the freezer for chilled shots and half in a cabinet. I've dropped them a couple of times during cleaning and they haven't broken on me yet. I bought them for layered shots and they display the layers wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, clean and nice.
customer_reviews.text: I run a bar and have bought several packs of these. They look nice, take en extra large shot and withstand many more drops and slam downs than others I have used. No cons.
customer_reviews.author: auburntiger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality! Impressed customer!
customer_reviews.text: Theses were great! Perfect size I ordered 60 of them for my birthday dinner, 10 boxes, only 1 glass arrived broken, but I was very please with them. Great party favor for my guest! Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer B. Louis

customer_reviews.title: A Wonderful Value
customer_reviews.text: I like these glasses a lot! For the price I expected something a bit less sturdy but the actual glasses are nice and heavy with a really nice feel. The bottoms are well weighted and the rest of the glass feels like it would withstand a bit of impact before breaking. The box in which they are packed is a really cool design and provides more than adequate protection. These really exceeded my expectations and if you like the design that you see in the photo, I think you will be pleased with these glasses.
customer_reviews.author: California Man

customer_reviews.title: Good transaction - were well packaged
customer_reviews.text: As described. Purchased to use to hold toothpicks - much nicer than plastic holders. Good transaction - were well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: MommaKirbs

customer_reviews.title: Good looks solid glass feel, one broken
customer_reviews.text: Really nice shot glasses, strong glass and really nice design. The mouth of the glass is a bit wider than it looks in the product images but it actually looks really good that way. One of the glasses came broken however so giving it a lower rating due to that
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great shooter glass.
customer_reviews.text: These little glasses are perfect for passed hor d'oevres. Watermelon or gazpacho shooters looked great in them. The flared top also makes washing a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous & Classic!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with the design, heft & quality of these beautiful shot glasses. I've recently replaced all my glassware with items from your company! And why not? Everything is magnificent! These classic shot classes will add a sophisticated note to any bar set up. Terrific value & price.
customer_reviews.author: PolarPro

customer_reviews.title: quality glass ware
customer_reviews.text: I bought 24 to start a family tradition like they do in Slovenia. A shot is at each place setting before the meal is served. This helps the stomach get ready for the big meal to follow. I researched many shot glasses but chose these as they are 2 oz. and don't spill a 1.5 oz. shot
customer_reviews.author: Grain Farmer

customer_reviews.title: One arrived broken...but problem resolved!
customer_reviews.text: One of these arrived broken, thanks to Amazon's spotty record with packing. However, these glasses are really great for lots of uses around the house. They are very sturdy. I called Amazon 866 216 1072 and got an incredible guy in Uruguay who was so nice that it totally changed around a day that had started out bad for me. He is sending me a replacement and I don't even have to send the unbroken ones back. This is the kind of experience that makes me want to stick with Amazon forever....that's why I put five stars....
customer_reviews.author: Amy Duluth

customer_reviews.title: liquor glasses
customer_reviews.text: sturdy bottom, correct size HOWEVER like most of the other reviews 1 glass came broken!
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect shot glass.. Slight flared top enables you to get the aroma just as you ingest your favorite liquor. Feels good in your hand, durable and cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rob M.

customer_reviews.title: look expensive
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing a set of these shot glasses for myself, I like them so much that I bought more for gifts. Can’t beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: BobinATL

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect size for sherry or an Irish creme. Very solid thick glass. One fell over on a granite counter and did not break or crack.
customer_reviews.author: Biketracker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Needs better packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of these glasses are excellent. Unfortunately, one of mine was broken when I received it. I didn’t have to have six for what I’m using them for, so it wasn’t worth returning.
customer_reviews.author: Walelia

customer_reviews.title: They look and feel much better than the cheap plastic ones I tend to see ...
customer_reviews.text: These shot glasses have some heft to them and feel very high quality. They look and feel much better than the cheap plastic ones I tend to see all the time. No complaints overall.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Not garbage disposer friendly
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised. Only issue is my garbage disposal keeps eating them up. I should be ordering another set along with a garbage disposal pretty soon
customer_reviews.author: JWill

customer_reviews.title: All Of It!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really needed some REAL shot glasses instead of using the infamous plastic red cups I was using, while pouring how much liq I thought would amount to a normal shot. Yeah... I was doing just that on the card game and fight party nights. Not anymore tho. These happen to be the exact same type of shot glasses (well... they seem to be) that the bars use. I love them! 5 Stars All Day Long!
customer_reviews.author: OT

customer_reviews.title: Ahora tequila
customer_reviews.text: Strong and steady. Perfect size to hold a lime wedge on the top for easy drinking. Plain but look very elegant.
customer_reviews.author: PRgypsySMS

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made glasses that are heavy and durable. More like a double shot but definitely worth the purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven P Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Tried finding some 2oz shot glasses at Bed and Bath. They wanted an arm and leg. I found these, and they're working better than expected. Perfect for my daily shots of wheatgrass juice. The wide top allows me to juice directly from my machine into the glass so I get the perfect amount every time. Whole family does grass so these glasses get a lot of use. Would definitely recommend and purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but some broken.
customer_reviews.text: Shot glasses are great, contemporary looking and nice weight. Very pleased with the glasses, but disappointed that in one of the two sets I ordered 2 of the 6 glasses arrived broken.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Bee

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: Nice glassware, but not packed well at all. One of the glasses arrived broken--and since it was meant as a gift, that didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Shot Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I went on her to buy these as a gift for my friend who didn't have any when we went to take shots at her house one day. When I found these, I not only bought her and her husband two packages; but, I bought myself 2 packs as well. They look great and are a great weight. The glass is thick and not thin. They feel like they will stand up and look great on my bar.
customer_reviews.author: La_Aka_6

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Graceful, attractive 2 oz glasses. I use them for limoncello.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are simple shot glasses and yet they are more than that. I haven't broken a single one yet and I'm pretty clumsy. These are durable and they are the perfect size too. I think they are good quality. I would buy these again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: karebear

customer_reviews.title: Fragile
customer_reviews.text: Nice but if they tip over on a stone counter they will break. Seriously, just tipping over!
customer_reviews.author: Rider for Life

customer_reviews.title: Great for tequila/shot drinkers.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these - they fit my shelf nicely, are 2oz and have a great feel. a set of 6 for a great price. Happy I bought.
customer_reviews.author: ShuMO

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this purchase for the price. They are beautiful large size shot glasses. I really wanted something my guests could use that was large enough that you could have the choice of doing the shot or of just sipping out of it. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Datl

customer_reviews.title: Beutiful Shot Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glasses made in Italy and look just as good as the picture!
customer_reviews.author: Tina M Peters

customer_reviews.title: But great classic shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: These have held up for years. A couple came broken in shipping. But great classic shot glasses.
customer_reviews.author: w

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glasses. Only problem was when I received them
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses. Only problem was when I received them, two of the glasses were shattered. I looked at the packaging and saw it wasn't even marked as fragile. I'm a bit disappointed with that fact. Over all though, they're pretty nice. The ones that were in tact that is.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the shot glasses I just purchased. The price was right and the look is just right also
customer_reviews.author: IdyG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful slim sexy and feels great in the hand and on the lips
customer_reviews.text: If you want a nice shot glass for those who like to sip their shots. Say for Grand Mariner or a fine Tequila. This is a fantastic shot glass. They are elegant and beautiful. They come to a nice thin edge so be careful washing. I would buy again. Perfect glassware for the home bar.
customer_reviews.author: Ken E

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, these were purchased for photography, they take abuse being frozen and have hard objects dropped into glasses. They are not as thin as they appear in photo
customer_reviews.author: J. Tulino

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: Great shot glasses! Very smooth glass. Classy. Nice heft and feel. Wide mouth opening at the top for easy sipping. Hold exactly 2 ounces when filled to the brim. A great addition to my bar-ware collection.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great look/feel
customer_reviews.text: These shot glasses are probably the best on Amazon as far as cost versus look/feel. They're quite tall, with a large, solid bottom, giving them a hefty weight in the hands. The only issue is they seem to tip over easily (thanks to the height). They do seem to be strong enough to handle a few tipovers, since I haven't broken one yet!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Fay

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Price vs quality? This is absolute bargain. I even used it for espresso shot and although it is not meant for espresso, it definitely looks great. Build quality is great, and handling and feeling is superb too. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Naffy

customer_reviews.title: VERY high quality
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous, and just nice to look at or hold. Well weighted, and a real work of art. I use these only to mix very concetrated juices of 30,000Mg per ounce of Acai, Noni, Mangosteen, Goji, Sea Buckthorn, and Resveratrol in liquid form (of course). I realize my review isnt worth 2 cents, but these do deserve another positive review on board. I do think the packaging should have been more cautious, but I am reviewing the product and not who packaged and shipped it. They are worth the money without any doubt. You get what you see. They are that gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: JustAnOpinion

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice shot glasses, unfortunately I ordered two packages and one showed up shattered.
customer_reviews.author: la a

customer_reviews.title: Elegant
customer_reviews.text: These shot glasses are the perfect size to serve a liqueur, or a shot of tequila or whiskey. The style and grace of these glasses will impress your guests. A nice solid weight to them, not too delicate. You know you are holding the glass when you pick it up. I was impressed with the shipping packaging. There was no way these glasses could be shattered in shipping no matter how they were tossed around; they were packed so efficiently. Every glass arrived whole. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: These are great shot glasses! Very nice quality, heavy and the glass is flawless. They provide a healthy 2oz shot for that favorite whiskey or other spirit you hold dear. I have ordered a couple of sets of these and highly recommend them, the price has been fantastic as well
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Gimshewicz

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with how these look
customer_reviews.text: I wanted more "unique/elegant"-style shot glasses. I'm very pleased with how these look, and they feel nice and "sturdy" for glass. They're not stackable, which I was slightly disappointed in, but that's really not a big deal. I've had these for a few months, and I like them enough to give 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: sunnycaligirl

customer_reviews.title: and arrived quickly and in good condition. They're plain shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured, and arrived quickly and in good condition. They're plain shot glasses, there really isn't much else to say.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: They feel sturdy and look nice
customer_reviews.text: For the price, how can you complain about these? They feel sturdy and look nice. Definitely an upgrade over the old measuring cups I was using for shots.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Beasi

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses, bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 boxes of these shot glasses and 2 of them came with a broken shot glass in them. It looks like it is the manufacturer's fault for how it is packaged as two of the boxes didn't have cardboard separating the shot glass that broke from another one where as the box that was OK did have the cardboard separator. Otherwise though these are very nice shotglasses - I filed for a refund with Amazon and they have already placed a replacement order with overnight shipping so if you aren't in a hurry you'll get your unbroken set eventually. They look exactly like you see in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great shot glasses and an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I bought several set's of these for an upcoming rum tasting party that I have having. Really like them. HIgh quality, they ship in a reusable storage box, and good price. Solid base and glass. I will order more once they get off product hold. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: joe777

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Affordable!
customer_reviews.text: They're beautiful! I cannot believe how cheap they are. With Prime I got them for a total of $11. Not a scratch or blemish on them. I'd order them again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Petersen

customer_reviews.title: The whole box was broken!!!
customer_reviews.text: They arrived broken!!! The whole box! I couldn't even open the box cuz pieces of glass were falling out of it. Return immediately!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO PRETTY
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE BEAUTIFUL EVERYONE LOVES THEM SOME DID COME BROKEN BUT THE COMPANY TOOK CARE OF THIS ASAP SHIPPED WHOLE NEW SET NEXT DAY NICE LOOKING GLASSES PERFECT FOR SHOTS !!!
customer_reviews.author: BLONDIE111

customer_reviews.title: They look cool. They're heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: It holds tequila shots. They look cool. They're heavy duty. Don't be lazy and let the last little drop of tequila sit in there on your bar overnight because they will certainly suck to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K.

customer_reviews.title: Simple, yet elegant
customer_reviews.text: Nice, simple shot glasses for when you throw a mixer at your place. Recently got to use them for a Labor Day party.
customer_reviews.author: Big_Boi23

customer_reviews.title: Great price - bad shipping
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are as expected but terribly packed. One broke in shipping and I was amazed it was only one of the six.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: great look, but not sure about quality
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - elegant shape Cons: - box it came in was incredibly dusty - one of the shot glasses was chipped - glass probably not that strong
customer_reviews.author: spaceballadTop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as 2 ounces of juice is my limit as a diabetic. The bottoms add a nice weight and avoid tipping over.
customer_reviews.author: Eames

customer_reviews.title: I love these shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: The price of these was unbeatable. I love these shot glasses. They are quite hefty and feel solid. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KMichelle

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Classy and great looking. All for Eight bucks? I couldn't say no. Overall am happy I bought these. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: izzy

customer_reviews.title: Serviceable shot glasses.
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what you expect. Feel solid. Have not seen one dropped onto a tile floor yet, but a few of my guests have slammed them down on the granite countertop pretty forcefully without incident.
customer_reviews.author: SunDvlAdvocate

customer_reviews.title: Open right away or beware of broken items.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are beautiful and elegant. Unfortunately I didn't need the glasses for over a month. When I opened them 1 glass out of 6 boxes was broken. Since I didn't open early enough I lost out.
customer_reviews.author: William Westergard

customer_reviews.title: Bit pricey, but nice design
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey for the simplicity of the design, and they are just slightly lighter than what I'd expect given the large base of the glass, but still a very stylish shot glass.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: classy
customer_reviews.text: I like the tall thin style and weight of these very much, classy.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and feeling.
customer_reviews.text: Great little shot/port glasses...they feel nice and substantial in your hand.
customer_reviews.author: BMP

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Elegant and heavy. These glasses feel solid and look great and were a great deal when I bought them for only $8!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best shot glasses ever
customer_reviews.text: Best shot glasses ever, and I looked at a few. Inexpensive, yet looking great; not too thick, yet feeling substantial, simplistic, yet elegant. You can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: K. Pirimoglu

customer_reviews.title: Just So Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I am blind, so I depend on the description, and my intuition to pick this kind of thing. These sounded ok, and were relatively inexpensive. When they arrived, they were so much more than that! They were just lovely! Very nice shape, a bit taller than I had thought. My sighted friend, who saw them, talked me into giving her one! They're beautiful! The only problem is that, if they've been used well, they might be a bit topheavy, and a bit delicate. But they are just lovely!
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Warke

customer_reviews.title: beautiful shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: these shot glasses are soo purdy, i can make me a drink at home and serve it like a fancy restaurant/bar
customer_reviews.author: momo

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to have a nice simple shot glass. They appear to be very solid. I washed them in the dishwasher with no problems. Just what I wanted, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set of glasses. I have gotten compliments on the glasses as well as the drink in them! The have a nice weight to them.
customer_reviews.author: Viking

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and Well Design
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and feel great to the touch. They arrived well packaged. They're not thin and fragile as they look in the picture but rather robust.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: these standard shot glasses have a very nice look. They're sturdy, pour great and make a great gift. Great price for a 6 pack of shot glasses.
customer_reviews.author: KayS

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product at a reasonable price. Arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Paolozzi

customer_reviews.title: nice solid shot glass and a great price
customer_reviews.text: not sure these are actually 2oz. its close though. nice solid shot glass and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: SmartShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are sturdy yet classy. These 2-ounce shot glasses won't tip over unless your hand-eye coordination has been severely affected. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty and quality made shot glasses. Perfect for entertaining. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Really nice and thick
customer_reviews.text: Finally some decent size shots. Love them. Really nice and thick, great quality. 5 Star!!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the bar.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy and look exactly as shown in photo. Perfect little set of shot glasses.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glasses
customer_reviews.text: Nice and heavy 2 ounce shot glasses that have a nice feel when holding them.

customer_reviews.title: nice and heavy
customer_reviews.text: got these for my dad for christmas, he loved them and uses them regularly.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality great price! Reviews sold me. Hope this helps someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Hoofer

customer_reviews.title: I figured for the price 4 shot glasses still a good deal and ordered anyway
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewer's mentioned one or two being broken upon receipt. I figured for the price 4 shot glasses still a good deal and ordered anyway. None of mine were broken or chipped. Very satisfied with the shot glasses.
customer_reviews.author: J. Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for ta-ta shots. lime in the mouth, salt on the neck, and tequila in the glass (pinched between).

customer_reviews.title: Classy, at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I would def recommend these to anyone who wants to start a drinking glass set. They have a nice heavy base, and look really nice.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for after dinner liquors or specialty shots as well as desserts. Very inexpensive, but high quality!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition and great quality! Exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: My shot glasses I received were in perfect condition and were excellent quality. The glasses are exactly as they appear in the picture with a very thick, heavy, and sturdy base. No bubbles in any of my glasses either. I would definitely buy these glasses again, were someone to take mine because they are so awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Danny McEntire

customer_reviews.title: Have a shot of wheatgrass in this handsome glass
customer_reviews.text: Well balanced with good weight in an elegant design. Pure glass and easy to clean. Perfect for our wheatgrass regimen!
customer_reviews.author: Devala

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the shot glasses I wanted and came pretty quickly. Its very common design but when you want to get drunk, then I would like these more than fancy ones.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good glasses. Cheap too
customer_reviews.text: These shot glasses are big, but just pour accordingly. They're easy to clean, and they seem durable. No complaints. Yay

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: These shot glasses look great, and have a very classy look to them. Very good quality for the price, would buy more.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish and functional for use as a liqueur glass. Hope our future guests are as impressed as I am.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I have owned other Bormiolo glassware---ypsilon and find them all timeless and practical. There is a sharp suppleness to the lines.

customer_reviews.title: nice and heavy
customer_reviews.text: These are great little drink glasses for that after dinner drink, they are nice and heavy and fit your hand nicely

customer_reviews.title: Cool shape
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because I like the cool shape. Didn't really need six of them but that's the way they were packaged!!!

customer_reviews.title: Appitizer shot glassses
customer_reviews.text: I love serving interesting appitizers. These glasses look beautiful when filled with various snack items. Great purchase, good price.

customer_reviews.title: High quality for great price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift and the receiver really loved them. They are a good weight and super nice. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: NYCin

customer_reviews.title: good stuff
customer_reviews.text: nice weight. feels good. looks good. makes it worth it...
customer_reviews.author: unsworthyeti

customer_reviews.title: Good luck with the poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is fair, but the packaging fails. One of the shot glasses was shattered on delivery. The effort to complain and return for replacement wasn't worth the trouble. My best action is to never buy any product from this manufacturer again. That will cost them more money than it would have cost them to replace the broken shot glass.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid shot glasses with a nice design. Holds a little more than your normal shot glasses. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: The F

customer_reviews.title: great shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they look fancier than regular shot glasses. I use them sometimes when I want to make a cool looking shot. Great deal for 6 nice glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: exquisite
customer_reviews.text: precision forging, heavy base, classy looking. good instruments for my patron gold. and price makes it even more appealing. highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: So I do like these, but 2 of the 6 glasses came ...
customer_reviews.text: So I do like these, but 2 of the 6 glasses came broken. I really do not need more than 2 but I did pay for 6 and ended up with 4.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Smith

product_meta.title: Bormioli Rocco Dublino Collection Shot Glasses - Set of 6 Clear Shot Tumblers With Heavy Base – 2-Ounce Shooter Glass For Spirits & Liquors – Classic European Design Drinkware For Bar, Pub & Home Use
product_meta.description: Introducing The Bormioli Rocco Dublino Collection Shot Glasses! Bormioli Rocco has designed these stunning shot glasses to help you make amazing memories with your friends! These beautiful 2-ounce shooter glasses come in a set of 6, and they can be used to serve many types of spirits and liquors, including: Whisky, Tequila, Vodka, Rum, Irish Cream, Aperetifs, Digestifs. The European-style shot cups can also be used by professional bartenders to measure shots for delicious cocktails. Premium Quality Shot Glasses Made in Italy! These elegant shot vessels are made in Italy using heavy duty materials and the best manufacturing methods. For this reason, they are incredibly durable, so you can put them in the dishwasher without worrying that their crystal clear glass will get cloudy. The shot cups have a sleek curve, a smooth rim and a heavy base, thanks to which they are incredibly sturdy and very comfortable to hold! Get the Dublino Collection shot glass set and use them in your bar, pub, restaurant or even at home during parties. You can also get the 6-piece shot glass set as a gift to a friend or family member, to add to their drinkware collection. So what are you waiting for? Place an order today and elevate your shot drinking experience! Bottoms up! Scroll up and click the add to cart button now!
feature_bullets: GET THE UNIQUE DUBLINO COLLECTION: Bormioli Rocco presents you with the Dublino Collection shot glasses that are made in Italy! These 2-ounce shot cups come in a set of 6, and you can use them at your bar, pub, restaurant or even at home during parties and gatherings.

ENJOY A SPIRIT OR LIQUOR SHOT: What kind of shooter do you prefer? These shot tumblers can be used to drink all kinds of spirits and liquors, including whiskey, tequila, vodka, rum, Irish cream, as well as apéritifs and digestifs. This shot vessel will elevate your drinking experience!

ULTRA STURDY MODERN DESIGN: Our shooter glasses have a super-sleek, curved design, a smooth rim and a solid heavy base. Thanks to its modern design and heavy base, these shot drink glasses are absolutely sturdy and they provide you with the most comfortable grip.

PREMIUM HEAVY DUTY GLASS: Made with premium quality glass and the best Italian manufacturing methods, these eco-friendly tequila shot glasses are dishwasher safe and incredibly durable. If you buy the Bormioli Rocco shot glass set today, you won’t have to replace it anytime soon!

GREAT GIFT IDEA FOR MEN AND WOMEN: Any man or woman would love to receive this stunning 6-piece shot glass set as a gift! The Dublino Collection shot glasses will decorate their house and be the center of every party, so trust us, you can’t go wrong with Bormioli Rocco.
